resources.string: Enable to allow NotificationsWidget receive all incoming notifications. The disclaimer displayed when enabling the accessibility service is standard Android message. The app DOES NOT collect any data beside the needed data to display on widget. Please note that the app DOES NOT have Internet Access permission so it actually cannot send the data anywhere.
The device will wake up and the screen will turn on when new notification arrives
The device won\'t wake and the screen stays off when new notification arrives
Wake device and turn screen on when new notification arrives (cancels led light)
